dmca.title: NetEnforcers complains of  images in Froogle
dmca.body:
Tue, 17 Oct 2006 09:22:50 -0400

Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints
 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named [ Sony Home Video ] ("IP Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.
 

Identity of advertisement(s) at issue/Images owned by [ Sony Home Video ] / :
 

Hotbuyselectronics                   DVP-CX995V
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.hotbuyselectronics.com/images/Sony_DVPCX995V.jpg&size=2&dhm=71370ff8&hl=en
 
Buydonlin                                 DVP-CX777ES
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://raq4.buydonlin.com/Merchant2/images/products/DVPCX777ES.jpg&size=2&dhm=594c6e15&hl=en
 
All Home Theater                     DVP-CX777ES
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.allhometheater.net/images/1247.jpg&size=2&dhm=3bd90dee&hl=en
 
Audio Video Sale                     SLV-N900
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://audiovideosale.net/images/sony-slvn99.jpg&size=2&dhm=76e79d9d&hl=en
 
Park Ave Electronics                D-VE7000S
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.parkaveelectronics.com/images/big/DVE7000S.jpg&size=2&dhm=4be93f46&hl=en
 
AA Deals                                 DVP-CX995V
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.aadeals.com/product/dvpcx995v.gif&size=2&dhm=c5adcbdd&hl=en
 

BrandNamez                            DVP-CX995V
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://brandnamez.com/prodimg/SON-DVPCX995V.jpg&size=2&dhm=e992bae0&hl=en
 

iBuy Digital                               DVP-CX995V
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.ibuydigital.com/images/products/107/10789_200x200.JPG&size=2&dhm=ab855ab0&hl=en
 

Zalmar                                      DVP-CX995V
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://zalmar.com/images/DVPCX995V.jpg&size=2&dhm=a94f39cf&hl=en
 

Foto Connection                       DVP-CX995V
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.fotoconnection.com/prodImgs/290x260/ca84722b91fbd7ca02e35d288e096b88.jpg&size=2&dhm=c30974d2&hl=en
 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 

Printed Name: [Phillip Williamson]
Title & Company: [Enforcement Team, Net Enforcers, Inc.]
Street Address: [P.O. Box 2132]
City and State: [Gainesville, FL]
Zip: [32601]
Email (ended auction inquiries)*: [Ebay.Violations@NetEnforcers.com]
Fax: [954.827.2381]
Date: [ 10/17/06]
 

Truthfully,
/S/:  Phillip Williamson
